Translations.Text: My thus narrate ona some zvest minuly generations My revealed ona odkaz z us
Those disregard it bear load (z zhresit) Dni Vzkriesenie
Eternally they abide therein; co chudobny load Dni Vzkriesenie
Ze je dni when roh blown my zvolat guilty ze dni blue
(Whispering themselves they say Ona zostat 1 zivot) ziaden inak than 10 dni
My bol fully aware z ich utterances. The vela accurate among them say Ona zostat ziaden inak than dni
They ziadat ona mountains. Say Moj Lord wipe them out
He lavy them mat rad barren byt zem
Nie vecer slightest hill will ona see therein nor dip
Ze dni everyone nasledovat caller slightest deviation. All zdravy zmlknut before the Vela Gracious; ona hear nothing whispers
Ze dni intercession bol zbytocny except for those permitted by the Vela Gracious whose utterances zhodny Jeho will
He zauzlit ich minuly ich buduci chvila ziaden encompasses Jeho znalost
All faces submit Zivy Eternal those kto burdened ich transgressions zlyhat
Mat rad for those zavodny righteousness chvila verit they have fear z injustice adversity
My thus revealed it Arabic Quran my cited v it all laskavy z prophecies they saved it zapricinit them berie heed
